title: Your account has been flagged.
body:
Please help.
I did the following:
To request funds, simply create a GitHub Gist with your Ethereum address pasted into the contents (the file name doesn't matter), copy paste the gists URL into the above input box and fire away! You can track the current pending requests below the input field to see how much you have to wait until your turn come
I put the address in:
https://www.rinkeby.io/  cripto faucet
Then I got the answer that there is no such user (although I regained github-gist) and after that I was on github "Your account has been flagged"
So please explain to me whether I'm doing something wrong and you can unblock my github account.
Thanks

Very strange - just tried it for your gist and it worked fine:
![selection_143](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/111600/29578911-4f153f16-8771-11e7-9418-e455c114f7c5.png)
Also I am using this function quite often and was never flagged AFAIK - perhaps ask github why this was - I don't really think it has something to do with go-ethereum ..

GitHub contacted us a few weeks ago that a lot of people are creating new/empty accounts only to use the Rinkeby faucet and their system is occasionally deleting those as invalid ones (or duplicate accounts). I don't think there's much we can do apart from implementing Google/Twitter signing for the faucet.

I'd also suggest sending an email to GitHub to clear up that it's a valid account and not a throwaway.

I to have been flagged and dont know why I have an idea of why I use the git-cli application 
and I added a website i created when i was still a beginner in php and mysql and used the git add * command not once but twice i think im flagged by a bot as a bot
My account was flagged and I had no idea why!
Why is my account flagged?? please make it available
Same. Weird
same, i tried to contact github, but they still on vacations
My account was flagged as well. No idea why but I'm glad they have such a great system in place so that people AT THE VERY LEAST know the supposed reason that caused it.
Same... Only just set up my account and started to fill out my profile and flagged straight away. Not a good start :/
hrm
i have this issue too :(
But I have a same problem when i open a nonsense pull request at vulhub/vulhub.

I read this in my account. ...Why..????

Your account has been flagged.

Because of that, your profile is hidden from the public. If you believe this is a mistake, contact support to have your account status reviewed.

Ok, WHAT the ACTUAL fuck. I DONT HAVE WORK DAYS. I AM WORKING FOR CLASS, AND I WAS FLAGGED?! https://github.com/ElijahChase/TheSeelkRaod
THERES NOTHING WRONG HERE. WHAT THE ACTUAL FUCK.
WHY AM I FLAGGED.
Help please. My github account is flagged, but I don't know why. How do I get rid of the flag?

My account also. I think,
"Have to leave GIT"  :(
This community is not for me.
my account got flagged, i have dropped several emails to support but no response yet.
My account is flagged, but I don't know why. How do I get rid of the flag?
I just got flagged. Because... I changed my accountname. The thing is, it's a new account, and I didn't like the old name. Now what?

My account has been flagged and I don't know why. All my projects have been halted and my applications have broken down because they read files from my repositories. I have contacted the support team twice but nothing has changed. Please help fix that for me. It's really disturbing.

My account has been flagged just after I created it. It's really frustrating.
Sent a support mail about this.
Please fix. Thanks
My account has been flagged just after I created it. and i have no idea  about that
Today I logged into my Github account and noticed a message says that my GitHub account has been flagged and I don't know why I have an idea of why?! Would you tell me what to do now?

my account is also flagged can anyone help 
i want to claim my reward at hacktober fest 2020 
please help ......
Same problem
Same problem  don’t know why my account has been flagged.
my account is also flagged can anyone help
my account has been flagged because i changed password, please unflag
Your account has been flagged, Y?
